mapper.select: select p.pno, p.pname, p.pth, p.pprice, p.bas_addr, p.maxqty, p.sdt, m.pmedno, m.ppath, m.pmtype from PMED m right outer join PROG p on m.pno=p.pno left outer join TRN t on p.trnno=t.trnno

select p.pno, p.pname, p.pth, p.pprice, p.bas_addr, p.maxqty, p.sdt, m.pmedno, m.ppath from PMED m right outer join PROG p on m.pno=p.pno left outer join TRN t on p.trnno=t.trnno where t.trnno=#{value}
select p.pname,p.ptype,pm.pmedno,Max(pm.ppath),p.pno,pm.pno,pm.ppath FROM PROG p inner join PMED pm on p.pno = pm.pno Group By p.pname,p.pno,pm.pno order by pm.pmedno desc limit 6
mapper.insert: insert into PROG( pstno, bas_addr, det_addr, sdt, edt, pname, minqty, maxqty, pprice, pdesc, ptype, pgoal, pgoal_N, pth, ptover, pday, ptime, pstate, presult, cno, trnno) values( #{postNo},#{address},#{addDetail}, #{startDate},#{endDate}, #{name}, #{minQty}, #{maxQty}, #{price}, #{description}, #{proType}, #{proGoal}, #{proGoalNum}, #{proTh}, #{proTurn}, #{proDay}, #{proTime}, #{proState}, #{proResult}, #{challengeNo}, #{trainerNo})
mapper.select: select p.PNO,p.PNAME,p.PPRICE,u.uname from PROG p inner join TRN t on p.TRNNO = t.TRNNO inner join USER u on t.TRNNO = u.UNO
select p.*, t.*, u.*, m.* from PMED m right outer join PROG p on m.pno = p.pno left outer join TRN t on p.TRNNO = t.TRNNO left outer join USER u on t.TRNNO = u.UNO where p.pno=#{value}
select pno, trnno from PROG order by pno desc limit 1
